items.name: Deathblade
items.desc:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.desc: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1650 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 75%.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.desc: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.desc:
Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.desc:
Basic attacks heal the wearer for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the wearer gain a 30% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +25% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
items.shortDesc:
+AS
wearer and
allies within
1 hex in
the same row

items.name: Skirmisher Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.desc:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
+75% Crit.
(>100% Crit Chance become
+1% Crit Dmg)

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.desc:
Increases the wearer's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 20% bonus Attack Speed.

The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.desc:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.
items.shortDesc:
AP dmg
and MR shred
to 4 emenies
every 3rd atk

items.name: Titan’s Resolve
items.desc:
When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
items.shortDesc:
Stack AD&AP
when taken
dmg or crit hit.
At max stacks
gain +AR&MR

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.desc: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.
items.shortDesc:
Taunts enemies
Voidspawn
arises when
holder dies
It taunts again

items.desc:
The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Last Whisper
items.desc:
When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.desc: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power (including components).

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.desc: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to 45% of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.desc: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

MR and taking
Magic dmg
within 2 Hex

items.desc:
When the holder deals magic damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Spellweaver Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains +40% bonus critical strike damage.

can crit and
deals bonus

items.desc:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 25 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

items.desc:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 20% of their missing Health.

Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds

items.desc:
The holder gains the Renewer trait.

items.name: Hand of Justice
items.desc:
At the begining of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
- +45 Attack Damage and +45 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

bonus dmg
from crit. and
reflect dmg
to enemies

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.desc: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.desc:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

within 2 hexes

reduce healing

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.desc: Grants 250 bonus Magic Resist (including components).

items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Redeemed Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc:

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, and stuns the Ability's caster for 4 seconds.

items.desc:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 70% Health and shed all negative effects. After this effect triggers, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Riskthirster
items.desc: Physical damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 30% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. The holder takes 25% of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat.

Holder takes dmg.

gain AS (no stack)

items.name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
items.desc: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by -20%. The holder then gains +40% Attack Speed for each affected ally.

items.name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
items.desc:
Grants +75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. The holder also gains 30% Critical Strike Damage. Each time the holder attacks or cast their Ability, they take true damage equal to 3% of their maximum Health.

items.desc:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains +40% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 2 hex.

The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
items.desc: Attacks grant +9% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times. The holder is dealt 2.5% of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

items.desc:
Every other attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

The holder receives -33% Attack Damage.

items.desc: Every 3 seconds, the holder's next attack deals 20% of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

items.name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
items.desc: The holder's attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 50% of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

items.name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, an Unstable Voidspawn with 500 Health arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals 500 true damage to enemies within 1 hex(es).

Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 50% effective.
items.shortDesc:
Construct arises
when holder
dies. It deals
true dmg
when it dies.

items.desc: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced by 25%.

items.name: Ionic Dark-Spark
items.desc: Enemies and allies (except the holder) within 2 hexes are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage scaling with their maximum Mana. Enemies take 200% of their maximum Mana, and allies take 50% of their maximum Mana. Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the holder gains 10 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

The holder's Ability deals 50% less damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spells burn

items.desc: The holder gains 40% Critical Strike Damage and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The first time the holder casts their Ability each combat, they gain an additional 20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (this bonus applies to that Ability cast). Each time the holder casts their Ability, they deal 100% of their maximum Mana to themselves as true damage.

items.desc: The holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, and heals them for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Each time this happens, the holder damages themselves for 5% of their current Health as true damage.

wearer takes

items.name: Hand of Vengeance
items.desc:
At the beginning of combat, the holder gains both of the following:
- +40 Attack Damage and +40 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.
These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

items.desc: Grants 200 bonus Armor (including components).

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate Of Immortality
items.desc: The holder heals themself for 45 health every 2 seconds for each unit targeting them.

items.name: Eclipse Cape
items.desc:
Every 1.5 second(s), a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. The holder is also burned for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 8 seconds, and any healing they received is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
Burn an enemy
for 10 secs
within 3 hexes
dealt 25% of Max HP

be burned -25% HP for 8 sec

items.name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
items.desc:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead and behind that delays affected enemies' and other allies' first ability cast, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by 15%. Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

items.name: Turbulent Zephyr
items.desc:
When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

allies block a spell

items.desc: The holder's team gains +2 maximum team size, but the player's Little Legend takes +100% damage after losing a battle.

items.desc:
